message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $105?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $115. What do you think?
Thanks, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. How about we settle on $110? That seems like a fair compromise to me.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I can do $112, but I don't think I can go any lower. What do you think?
